body.p:
Harrodsburg 8 December 1860
His Excellency Govnr B Magoffin
Frankfort
Ky
Dear Sir

J W Hawkins Esqr A Justice of the peace for Mercer County has removed from his precinct and also resigned his commission, Please permit me to recommend for your consideration Mr William H Crutcher as a very suitable person to fill the office vacated by squire Hawkins

Your Obt
Humble Servt
Chr Chinn
P S In referance to the affairs of our Government I would say -- Glass right side up

Mercer Co
J. P.
Dist No 5
W. H. Crutcher
vice
I W Hawkins
Issd. Com. Dec 13 1860
